properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
DNC 14.
12 METER F/V TIKO, BLUE AND WHITE HULL, FOUR PERSONS
ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN 15-27.38N 063-14.51W
AT 031800Z JUL. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024, TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292, FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
